title: LegenVD
description:
Magic the Gathering strategy videos with a focus on the digital Magic Arena.
This channel is supported by its fans on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: Monogreen vs Standard.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a monogreen aggro stompy deck, featuring Keen-Eyed Curator, Innkeeper's Talent and Scrapshooter from Bloomburrow in Standard. 

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Deck Tech
04:39 - Match 1
09:21 - Match 2
13:13 - Match 3
15:42 - Match 4
19:48 - Match 5
22:57 - Match 6
25:48 - Match 7
29:48 - Match 8
34:03 - Match 9
38:52 - Match 10

Decklist: 
https://aetherhub.com/Deck/monogreen-stompy-bloomburrow

"Movement Proposition" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: This frog broke the Yargle Day event.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a blue/green croaking selfmill frog deck, featuring Grolnok, the Omnivore as commander in the Yargle Day Brawl event.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro 
00:46 - Deck Tech
05:19 - vs Glarb, Calamity's Augur
13:40 - vs Grolnok, the Omnivore
17:25 - vs Thalia and The Gitrog Monster
27:41 - vs Grolnok, the Omnivore
33:36 - vs Yargle, Glutton of Urborg
35:12 - vs Grolnok, the Omnivore
36:22 - vs Glarb, Calamity's Augur
38:58 - vs Grolnok, the Omnivore
40:11 - vs Thalia and The Gitrog Monster
41:17 - vs Grolnok, the Omnivore
43:48 - vs Helga, Skittish Seer
45:43 - vs Grolnok, the Omnivore
46:51 - vs The Gitrog, Ravenous Ride

Yargle Day Decklist: 
https://aetherhub.com/Deck/grolnok-yargle-event

Regular Brawl Decklist:
https://aetherhub.com/Deck/grolnok-the-omnivore-brawl
